meaningMnemonic: Behind that <radical>tree</radical> the <radical>sun</radical> is rising in the <kanji>east</kanji>. The sun always rises in the east, so if you head that way, past the tree, you'll be going east too.
readingMnemonic: You walk <kanji>east</kanji> for a few hours until you finally come to a city. It's <reading>とう</reading>きょう. Oh! とうきょう is in the east. I get it now!
